channel.title: CVE Feed for Tribe29 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tribe29 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-0284|2024-08-02T05:02:44.148Z -- tribe29 -- checkmk
item.description: Improper Input Validation of LDAP user IDs in Tribe29 Checkmk allows attackers that can control LDAP user IDs to manipulate files on the server. Checkmk <= 2.1.0p19, Checkmk <= 2.0.0p32, and all versions of Checkmk 1.6.0 (EOL) are affected.

item.title: CVE-2023-1768|2024-08-02T05:57:25.231Z -- tribe29 -- checkmk
item.description: Inappropriate error handling in Tribe29 Checkmk <= 2.1.0p25, <= 2.0.0p34, <= 2.2.0b3 (beta), and all versions of Checkmk 1.6.0 causes the symmetric encryption of agent data to fail silently and transmit the data in plaintext in certain configurations.

item.title: CVE-2023-2020|2024-08-02T06:12:19.531Z -- tribe29 -- checkmk
item.description: Insufficient permission checks in the REST API in Tribe29 Checkmk <= 2.1.0p27 and <= 2.2.0b4 (beta) allow unauthorized users to schedule downtimes for any host.
